ygData.subject: Re: How do you use the lull song and Star Wars.
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings and welcome fellow of the arts. Well let us see what knowlege we can bestow. The level 8 Lull song as you call it is targeted.  Be close enough to
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and welcome fellow of the arts.
Well let us see what knowlege we can bestow.

The level 8 Lull song as you call it is targeted. Be close enough to
your target that it works but not so close they respond to you.
Target one then play the song. they should glow purple similar
to the accelerando aura and be sad. I have yet to get this to work
on more then one target.

For money te best options are Wisps which themselves are of
moderate worth, their lightstones range from 1-5pp depending on
the type. Dervish thieves also have bronze weapons yeilding about 3 plat.
With a good set of friends you can try gluck and get netted and woven armor
to sell to monks and wizards,magician,necros. For around 5 plat.

On Thu, 20 May 1999 11:01:36 -0700 eqbards@onelist.com wrote:
> From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> Hello all,
>
> A couple of questions from a new bard on your list. (I apologize
> if these have been asked before) BTW, this is by far the most
> interesting and mature Everquest list that I have seen so far. Must
> say something about the type of person that enjoys playing a bard.
> (join the EQ_clerics list for a bit and you'll see what I mean...)
>
> 1. Exactly how do you use the Level 8 lull song? Is it an area
> effect song or do you have to target each MOB in turn? Perhaps a step
> by step description of the proper tactics to use when facing a group
> of yellwo-blue monsters would best illustrate this. (thanks)
>
> 2. Did anyone else notice how quiet it was last night on the
> Everquest servers? They only had about 60% of their normal
> population. Guess there is a strong correlation between playing
> Everquest and being a Star Wars fan... :smiles knowingly.
> I expect that the next few days may be a good time to grab some
> experience at those place that always seem to be over camped.
>
> 3. I am a Level 10 human Bard. I usually party with an Enchanter
> (good combo, the pet tanks, she zaps and I tank/support) but I am
> rather poor. Any good suggestions on location or MOBS that garner a
> goodly amount of loot so I can finish my banded ensemble?
>
> Thanks in advance,
>
> Bujold (Xegony) (look no e.. :))
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: where the world talks!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today.
